turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule a doctor's appointment for myself.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can help with that. Could you please tell me your full name, the reason for your visit, and if you have a preferred doctor or date/time?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: My name is Sarah Johnson. It's just a routine check-up. I'd like to see Dr. Evans, and I'm hoping for something next week, maybe Tuesday or Wednesday afternoon.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Sarah. Let me check Dr. Evans' schedule for next week, specifically Tuesday or Wednesday afternoon. It seems those slots are quite busy. I see an opening on Wednesday at 10:00 AM or Thursday at 3:30 PM. Do either of those work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, 10 AM is really early for me, and Thursday is pushing it. I specifically wanted afternoon next week. Are there absolutely *no* other options next week? What about cancellations? Can I get on a notification list if something opens up?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration that those times aren't ideal. I can only see the currently available slots in our system. Unfortunately, our system doesn't have a feature for automatic cancellation notifications or a waitlist function. Would you like me to check the following week, or perhaps see if Dr. Evans has any morning slots on Tuesday/Wednesday that are slightly later, maybe closer to lunch?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: That's really inconvenient about the waitlist... Okay, fine. Let's check the week after next instead. Any afternoon time, Tuesday or Wednesday the week after next, would be great.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Checking the week after next for Dr. Evans on a Tuesday or Wednesday afternoon... Yes, I see an available slot on Tuesday, [Date - e.g., November 28th] at 1:30 PM. Would you like to book this appointment?
